name: Catanism: The Purrge
description:
Do you like cats?
Do you like puns?
Do you like rogue-like 2D-plattformers with pixelart style?

Catanism - The Purrge features all that and more!

Play a fluffy pro-cat-onist on his quest to cleanse the world from the catanistic cult that resides in the old temple on the mountain top.   Many dangers await you: cultists, demons, and environmental hazards that can ruin your run and end your existence.

Can you purrge them all?

Esc: Pause/Back/Cancel
Spacebar: Enter/ Jump
Shift: Hammer Jump 
A, D: Walk
S: Ground Pound 
F: Artifact
